summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General (OIG) interview waiver form, used to document that an employee is voluntarily providing information as part of an investigation. The specific subject of the investigation is redacted. The form includes warnings, assurances, and a signature block for the employee and a witness.
keyFacts: The document is a voluntary interview waiver form from the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG).
The form states the interview is voluntary, no disciplinary action will be taken for refusing to answer, but any statement provided may be used in future criminal or disciplinary proceedings.
The specific subject of the OIG investigation is fully redacted in the text provided.
